paragraphs.body: This is the page where the official Avatar Wiki community award, the User of the Month, is nominated and voted upon.
paragraphs.text: This is the page where the official Avatar Wiki community award, the User of the Month, is nominated and voted upon.

paragraphs.body: The User of the Month earns a userbox that is a permanent badge. This user is also featured on the main page. After receiving the award, users may not be nominated again for at least one year.
paragraphs.text: The User of the Month earns a userbox that is a permanent badge. This user is also featured on the main page. After receiving the award, users may not be nominated again for at least one year.

paragraphs.body: Click here to skip straight to the voting.

paragraphs.text: The User of the Month is a user who:

paragraphs.body: It should be noted that users who make a large number of very minor changes to boost their edit count are unlikely to be nominated. Remember that eligible nominators are all experienced users.
